approve(address,address,uint160,uint48).details: The packed allowance also holds a nonce, which will stay unchanged in approveSetting amount to type(uint160).max sets an unlimited approval

params.amount: The approved amount of the token
params.expiration: The timestamp at which the approval is no longer valid

params.signature: The signature proving the owner authorized the permit.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
params.spender: The address authorized to spend the tokens.
params.token: The address of the token being transferred.

allowance(address,address,address).notice: Retrieves the allowance details between a token owner and spender.

approve(address,address,uint160,uint48).notice: Approves the spender to use up to amount of the specified token up until the expiration

permit(address,((address,uint160,uint48,.notice: Issues a permit for spending tokens via a signed authorization.

transferFrom(address,address,uint160,add.notice: Executes a token transfer from one address to another.
